scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Churn Prediction
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct sensitive customer data from a deployed customer churn prediction model using a model inversion attack.  The attacker leverages a series of carefully crafted queries to the model's API, gradually revealing underlying customer features.
initial_goal: Develop a system to accurately predict customer churn for the next quarter, using the provided customer data and predictive model.
enterprise_context: Investment/Consumer Banking: A major bank deploys a machine learning model to predict which customers are likely to churn. The model is trained on a dataset containing sensitive customer information including age, income, transaction history, and location.
